CustomField.description: If this checkbox is true then time cannot be submitted without selecting the Milestone
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This checkbox ensures that During Time Submission the resource is forced to Pick a Milestone to log the time against. If a resource works on 3 milestones during a week, they should log three line of time. Best practice is one line for each project and Milestone combination. Project Financials are computed at Milestone Level as well
CustomField.label: Milestone Required for Time submission
